name: Grilled Scallions With Romesco
recipeIngredient: 3 bunches scallions, about 15 scallions, as thick as possible

recipeInstructions.text: Trim the roots from the scallions, remove outer layer if very thick and tough and cut into 6-inch pieces.
Heat a grill or stovetop grill pan until very hot. Brush the scallions with oil. Grill, turning, until well seared and tender.
Arrange on a platter and brush the romesco sauce over the white part of the scallions.
